titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning tynne.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: VVhitehall this two and twentieth day of Ianuary, in the ninth yeere of Our Reigne ...
Imprint from colophon, the date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 24; Steele notation: of pose 2) Tynne 3) pur- 4) any Starre-.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and
